description:
The Ruination Starter Pack is included with the Ruined King: A League of Legends Storyâ„¢ - Deluxe Edition Bundle

Content Includes: 
- Deluxe Potion Pack: A chest full of potions to aid the Champions in facing danger.
- Plunderer's Pendant: A golden pendant worn by those who seek great fortune. Grants 10% bonus gold from combat.
- Savant's Tome: A trinket carried by those who have studied the intricacies of combat. Grants 10% bonus xp from combat.
name: Ruination Starter Pack
